extendedInfo.description: The official Etsy for Android app. Fall in love with Etsy, anywhere. Shop on the go with our free mobile app. Discover over 17 million unique items from 800,000 sellers around the world.Explore what kindred spirits are favoriting on Etsy.Shop whenever inspiration hits.Manage your shop and orders with ease. Etsy for Android is available in English, German, French, Dutch, and Italian.For support, go to http://www.etsy.com/helpHelp report bugs at https://www.etsy.com/teams/7720/bugs/discuss/ About Etsy:Etsy is the worldâs handmade marketplace. Our mission is to empower people to change the way the global economy works. We see a world in which very-very small businesses have much-much more sway in shaping the economy, local living economies are thriving everywhere, and people value authorship and provenance as much as price and convenience. We are bringing heart to commerce and making the world more fair, more sustainable, and more fun. www.etsy.com

reviews.title: Ok could be better
reviews.comment: It\'s great for browsing and buying items, but unfortunately it can\'t be used to list new product (for Sellers). If the update for that comes I\'d rate higher.
reviews.author: Emilia Ramos

reviews.title: Not for sellers
reviews.comment: Please make this Seller friendly! Edit listings, mark shipped, see listing stats... I still use my browser mainly and its annoying. Please fix and update!
reviews.author: Taylor Buxmann

reviews.title: Not even close -  useless for sellers
reviews.comment: This app had only buyers in mind. I don\'t get any notification aside from email when I receive an order or a communication. I just moved from an iPhone and this app falls way short in comparison to the iPhone app. Need to have notification and listing capabilites.
reviews.author: Nicole Spann

reviews.title: Awesome! !
reviews.comment: Thanks so much for the widget! I constantly monitor my traffic in the webpage and am incresibly grateful I can see it on my homescreen now. Rated it 4 stars because it could use a list item feature. It is a solid build though! Thank you so much!
reviews.author: mario medina

reviews.title: Thx!
reviews.comment: Thanks so much for the update. I like being able to view my listings, orders and daily views. Would love to be able to print shipping labels, pay my bill and create listings from this app as well.
reviews.author: Chasta Delude

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: I would really like to see the option for paying my bills, listing items, and printing shipping labels added to this app
reviews.author: Sky Bernal

reviews.title: love my etsy ap
reviews.comment: after i realized i could still ad listings, and draft them, via the net, i have no problems with this ap.
reviews.author: Neen Von Bean

reviews.title: Fabulous finds and one of a kind items!
reviews.comment: There are many creative artists, crafts people and unique items to choose from!  It\'s great to have one location to shop for vintage goodies as well!
reviews.author: Dannielle Molesworth

reviews.title: Getting better
reviews.comment: As an etsy seller I can finally use this app for a quick look at my orders during production. THANK YOU. The widget is an awesome way to stick it to the apple saps.
reviews.author: Timothy Michalek

reviews.title: Would be better if....
reviews.comment: I could do more as a seller. All I can do is renew listings and see how views I got, not even a breakdown of the views. Can\'t view orders after I exit the app, need to log in on comp.
reviews.author: Angela Grace

reviews.title: Conversations.. About it
reviews.comment: Can\'t do anything else yet besides browse stuff and respond to messages. Obviously needs more work, will up the star rating once it gets better.
reviews.author: Maksim Lushchan

reviews.title: I wish there was a way to list an item from the app
reviews.comment: It would make the app more convenient for sellers.
reviews.author: Danielle Schmidt

reviews.title: It\'s great for browsing.
reviews.comment: If only it had a listing feature. It would be perfect then.
reviews.author: April Bagwell

reviews.title: Must Have for Etsy Enthusiasts!
reviews.comment: If you love Etsy,  you\'ll love this app!
reviews.author: Thomas Gaddis

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: Even with the latest update I can\'t add items to my cart, the update circle thing just keeps thinking.
reviews.author: Shady Klingensmith

reviews.comment: Seems to time out a lot, and I think the search function could be improved. Otherwise, it\'s very handy.
reviews.author: Hannah Sweat

reviews.title: Limited capability - esp for sellers
reviews.comment: As a shop owner, this app lacks necessary functionality on the go.  I can track order purchases, bu can\'t communicate with customers via conversations -- a key element that Etsy also rates you on for customer service stats -- reply rate to buyers.  You also can\'t see what orders have come in after the immediate alert.  If you\'re just browsing as a potential buyer, this app will be fine.
reviews.author: Clare Blankemeyer

reviews.title: Orders and comments
reviews.comment: I love this app! The only thing that I don\'t like is that I can\'t leave comments without getting a message saying I need to look for a confirmation email that I have not received. And I can\'t look at my past purchases. Other than that this app is great!
reviews.author: Amy Ward

reviews.title: Dislike!
reviews.comment: Very poor options. ... wanted to list items with my phone but that doesn\'t seem to be an option :(
reviews.author: Mandy Laack

reviews.title: Would love update for sellers.
reviews.comment: On the iphone app I could list items, edit items, basically I could do everything on my phone that I could do on my computer. I ran my shop from my phone.   It was very frustrating to me when I switched to the android app to find the only thing I can do on the Etsy app is browse and buy! I hope there is an update soon.
reviews.author: Kymm Thomas
